Posts.Content:
ok guys (or girls :) im in desperate need for help or advice. I'm just gonna throw everything out there in hopes someone will know EXACTLY what im talking abt. Abt 2 months ago I found a lump in my right breast. I've been told from a mammo approx 4 years ago that I have fibrotic cysts bc of breast feeding my 4 kids. Aka "lumpy breast tissue" so I didnt really think anything abt this new lump that I have found. Anywho...fast forward six weeks and the lump is abt a grape and a half bigger. Now almost 10 weeks after original lump found it has almost doubled in size and is shaped like a sickle cell (of you guys know what that looks like) I was having sharp occasional pain from my armpit down to my nipple seeming to skip over this lump that I can press on with no pain at all. I am now as of the last few days have had burning from my armpit to my nipple like hot water being poured on the area constantly. Due to my ins i cant even go to the dr much less any specialist or special tests until after jan 15 bc of work rules and regs. Blah! Any advice!?
thanks in advance!
roxy
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: Thank you! well we got an aflac policy that is in effect on mid January but there is a 30 day waiting period. If I am diagnosed within the 30 day waiting period they pay nothing for 2 years! If I get diagnosed (which I hope I don't) then aflac covers a ton of on coming medical expenses! It's a great policy for any kind of cancer. Since I am the primary income. .. it was important to think ahead I guess. But the waiting game is horrible!

any body have any advice or comments. Kinda desperate for direction here.
